channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for KS
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for KS

item.title: Report X-2023080728
item.description:
Report X-2023080728

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-29T21:11:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-02
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: WHILE THE PACKAGE HANDLER WAS UNLOADING, THEY HAD A STRONG ODOR AND WERE NOT ABLE TO UNLOAD THE TRAILER. THEY PULLED THE TRAILER OFF THE DOOR AND PLACED IN THE YARD FOR A LITTLE AND BROUGHT THE TRAILER BACK TO THE QA DOOR. QA UNLOADED THE TRAILER AND FOUND THE DAMAGED PACKAGE. THEY PLACED IT IN A TOTE LINED WITH A CLEAR, LARGE HAZMAT BAG AND PLACED THE PACKAGE IN THE VENTILATOR. DescribePack: ONE OF THE JARS IS COMPLETELY RUPTURED AND SPILLED OUT ITS CONTENTS. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A TOTE LINED WITH A CLEAR, LARGE HAZMAT BACK.

item.title: Report X-2023080611
item.description:
Report X-2023080611

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-29T21:11:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-02
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023080611 SequenceEvent: while a pacakge handler was unloading a trailer he noticed that a pacakge was damage leaking, he told to his manger. DescribePack: The pacakge had no inner packing so the contents got crushed and the paint cans got damage and a side of the lid come off. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The manger called QA and QA went to the area, we clean it up and brought the pacakge to the processing cage. 2. X-2023080612 SequenceEvent: While a pacakge handler was unloading a trailer he noticed a leaking package and he told to his manger. DescribePack: The inner pacakge was loose because the shipper did not add inner packing. the lid pops off and spilled out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: QA went to the area clean the spilled and brought the pacakge to the processing cage.

item.title: Report X-2023080575
item.description:
Report X-2023080575

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-29T21:11:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-01
  • City: WICHITA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: KCMO did not load the hazmat properly on the trailer. The hazmat was on the back of the trailer (with no load net), however it is uncertain whether the hazmat was loaded on the ground. When the trailer was opened the package fell on the ground causing the package to leak. the full tracking number for this package is 9622034090000153964000649682874442. DescribePack: The bottle inside of the package broke open causing it to leak. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: The package was put in a bag right away and taken to the hazmat cage.

item.title: Report E-2023080396
item.description:
Report E-2023080396

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-29T21:11:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-13
  • City: KANSAS CITY
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit and that the one poly 10 gallon pail of polycor (un1866) was damaged by a sharp object and had released 2 ounces of product. The warehouse crew was able to contain and cleanup the release, so no contractors were dispatched.

item.title: Report X-2023080532
item.description:
Report X-2023080532

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-28T18:15:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-30
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023080532 SequenceEvent: MANAGER NOTIFIED QA OF THE LEAKING PACKAGE. QA PLACED THE PACKAGE IN A LINED TOTE AND CLEANED UP THE SPILL. THE PACKAGE WAS THEN TAKEN TO THE PROCESSING CAGE. DescribePack: THE BOTTLE WAS LEAKING OUT FROM AROUND THE CAP AND SOILED THE BOX. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED TOTE. 2. X-2023080533 SequenceEvent: QA NOTICED THIS PACKAGE WAS LEAKING WHILE CLEANING ANOTHER LEAKING PACKAGE. THIS PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED TOTE AND SPILL WAS CLEANED UP. THE PACKAGE WAS THEN TAKEN TO THE PROCESSING CAGE. DescribePack: THE BOTTLE WAS LEAKING OUT FROM AROUND THE CAP SOILING THE BOX. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED TOTE.

item.description:
Report E-2023080318

  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit and that 2 of the poly 5 gallon pails of finish remover (un3267) had leaked and had released 10 gallons of product. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.

item.title: Report X-2023080497
item.description:
Report X-2023080497

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-24T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-28
  • City: TOPEKA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: UNLOAD FOUND PACKAGE ON ITS SIDE, SMALL AMOUNT OF LIQUID LEAKED OUT OF BOX. QA PLACED PACKAGE IN HAZMAT BAG AND TOTE AND REMOVED FROM HIGH TRAFFIC AREA DescribePack: BOX WAS ON ITS SIDE IN THE TRAILER AND SMALL AMOUNT OF LIQUID LEAKED FROM THE CAP DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: BAGGED AND REMOVED FROM TRAFFIC, TIGHTENED CAP
